constituent: humility, Freud, state of mind, true, truth, ten, needle, eye, tool, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Humility is the state of mind of accepting the truth about yourself - both favorable and unfavorable. (tweaked version of Raichu´s).
koohiiStory2: Humility is a state of mind when you consider yourself in accordance with the truth (you neither boast nor demean yourself).
kunYomi: つつし.む、つつし、つつし.み
myStory: cẩn thận. tính người. tâm trạng thực sự
words:
慎む(つつしむ): to be careful, to be chaste or discreet, to abstain or refrain
慎重(しんちょう): discretion, prudence
